line.token: * This file is part of Composer.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* The console application that handles the commands
* @var string|false Store the initial working directory at startup time
'Check https://getcomposer.org/doc/articles/troubleshooting.md#memory-limit-errors for more info on how to handle out of memory errors.'
// Register error handler again to pass it the IO instance
// determine command name to be executed without including plugin commands
// we'll check command validity again later after plugins are loaded
// prompt user for dir change if no composer.json is present in current dir
// abort when we reach the home dir or top of the filesystem
'<info>No composer.json in current directory, do you want to use the one at '
'<info>No composer.json in current directory, changing working directory to '
'<info>Always want to use the parent dir? Use "composer config --global use-parent-dir true" to change the default.</info>'
// avoid loading plugins/initializing the Composer instance earlier than necessary if no plugin command is needed
// if showing the version, we never need plugin commands
// not a composer command, so try loading plugin ones
// list command requires plugin commands to show them
') would override a Composer command and has been skipped</warning>'
// suppress these as they are not relevant at this point
// determine command name to be executed incl plugin commands, and check if it's a proxy command
'<warning>Composer supports PHP 7.2.5 and above, you will most likely encounter problems with your PHP '
'. Upgrading is strongly recommended but you can use Composer 2.2.x LTS as a fallback.</warning>'
'<warning>Composer is operating slower than normal because you have Xdebug enabled. See https://getcomposer.org/xdebug</warning>'
'<warning>Warning: This development build of Composer is over 60 days old. It is recommended to update it by running "%s self-update" to get the latest version.</warning>'
'<warning>Do not run Composer as root/super user! See https://getcomposer.org/root for details</warning>'
// Silently clobber any sudo credentials on the invoking user to avoid privilege escalations later on
// Silently clobber any remaining sudo leases on the current user as well to avoid privilege escalations
// Check system temp folder for usability as it can cause weird runtime issues otherwise
'<error>PHP temp directory (%s) does not exist or is not writable to Composer. Set sys_temp_dir in your php.ini</error>'
// add non-standard scripts as own commands
' would override a Composer command and has been skipped</warning>'
// symfony/console does not handle \Error subtypes so we have to renderThrowable ourselves
// instead of rethrowing those for consumption by the parent class
' is full, this may be the cause of the following exception</error>'
'The system cannot find the path specified'
'<error>The following exception may be caused by a stale entry in your cmd.exe AutoRun</error>'
'<error>The following exception is caused by a lack of memory or swap, or not having swap configured</error>'
'<error>The following exception is caused by a process timeout</error>'
* @return ?Composer If $required is true then the return value is guaranteed
'Skips the execution of all scripts defined in composer.json file.'
'If specified, use the given directory as working directory.'
' failed to return an array from getCommands'
' returned an invalid value, we expected an array of Composer\Command\BaseCommand objects'
* Get the working directory at startup time
